Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 4.1
  • PCI DSS Requirement 4.1.e

What to Do

Use the latest version of SSL/TLS on servers that use SSL/TLS.

Why

SSL v2 has known vulnerabilities in it, making SSL v2 unacceptable. The latest SSL/TLS version has addressed these vulnerabilities. New vulnerabilities may be found in the future, requiring a newer version of SSL/TLS to be used.

How

Most recent web servers support the latest SSL/TLS version. The latest version of SSL/TLS is Version 3(V3). If your server does not support the latest SSL/TLS version, consider updating it or installing a newer web server.
